pages.text: You might have noticed that the Nuclear Reactor is not craftable. That's simply because it's not yet finished! We are working on it, please be patient. :-)$(br2)We hope that you have enjoyed the mod so far.

Don't worry, we have planned much more content - we just need time to write it all! If you find bugs or have cool ideas that we could implement, let us know!$(br2)You can find our Discord server on our Curseforge page.
